intro_1: Implemented a major features such as Cost management, Night Audit, Rate adjustment, Reservations management features etc. for property management systems (ONDA Wave), ONDA PMS.
intro_2: Implemented key features of a property & reservation management tool to help operation-teams who used Postman to fetch and post reservation details.
intro_3: Helped implementing web services for an Intelligent Evacuation System. Web services were able to communicate between LoRa devices, and detect hight decibel sounds such as shooting incidents.
intro_4: Intelligent Guidance System For Emergency Situations. Developed, tested, deployed, and maintained RESTFul APIs to deliver IoT sensory data (audio, gas, temperature) to/from gateways detect emergency situations.
